verses.content: Lungril siemrêlnahai chu mihriem ta a na, Leia dawnna ruok chu LALPA kuoma inthawk a nih.
Mihriem lampuihai po po chu ama mithmuahai chun ân thieng a, LALPA ruok chun lungrilhai chu ân khi hlak.
I sinthawhai chu LALPA kuomah inkawltir la, I ngaituohai chu sukdet nîng a tih.
LALPA chun thil tinrêng hi san nei sengin a siem a, Anih, mi khawhlo ngei khawm chu ni ṭha nawa dingin.
Lungrila chapo taphawt chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a nih, Ama chu hrem naw ni naw nih.
Zângaina le thutak chun khawhlona chu sâwpfai a na, LALPA ṭina leiin mihaiin suolna an zâmsan.
Mi a um dânin LALPA a suklawm chun, A hmêlmahai ngei khawm ama le inrem dingin a siem.
Indiklona leia hlâwkna nasatakhai nêkin, Felna leia tlâwmte chu a ṭha lem.
Mihriem lungril chun a lampui chu a riruong hlak a, A kalchawihai ruok chu LALPA chun a kâwkhmu hlak.
Lal hmûrhaia chun vân tieng thusukthlûk chu a um a, Rorêlnaah a bau chun bawse ngai naw nih.
Inkhina le bûkna indikhai chu LALPA ta a na, Ip riknahai po po khawm chu ama sinthaw a nih.
Khawhlona thaw chu lalhai ta dingin tirdakum a nih, Lalṭhungpha chu felnaa tungding a ni sih a.
Hmûr felhai chu lalhai lâwm zâwng a na, Thudik hriltu chun an ngaina hlak.
Lal lunginsenna chu thina thangkohai an nih; Mi var ruok chun sukdei a tih.
Lal hmêl vara chun hringna a um a, A ditsakna chu ruo nuhnung sûm ang a nih.
Varna nei hi rângkachak nêka ieng ang khieua ṭha lem am a na! Anih, hrietthiemna nei hi tangka nêka thlang lem ding a nih.
Mi tluong lamtluongpui chu rîtlonaa inthawka fe hmang hi a na; Mi a lampui vêng ṭhatu chun a lungril chu a vawng ṭha.
Chapona hi sietna hmaah a fe hlak a; Chun, lungril uong chu tlûkna hmaah.
Mi chapohai le râllâk sum insem nêk chun, Mi inngaitlâwmhai le lungril inhnuoitaka um a ṭha lem.
Thu pawisatu chun thil ṭha hmûng a ta, LALPA ringtu chu, ama chu a hlim a nih.
Lungrila var chu mi var ti nîng a ta, Hmûrhai thlumna chun thiemna chu a sukpung.
Hrietthiemna hi a neitu ta ding chun hringna tuihnâr a na; Invêthai inchûktirna ruok chu an invêtna a nih.
Mi var lungril chun ama bau ân chûktir a; A hmûrhaia chun thiemna a belsapêk hlak.
Thu lâwmumhai chu khuoithlâr ang a na, Lungril ta dingin a thlum a, ruhai ta dingin hrisêlna a nih.
Mihriem kuoma indik âwmtaka inlang lampui chu a um a, Chu tâwpna ruok chu thina lampuihai a nih.
Mi sininrim phîngṭâmna chun ama ta dingin sin a thawh a, A bau chun ama chu a tirlui sih a.
Mi hmangnabo chun pawitâwkna a rawtdawk a, A hmûrhaia chun mei em kâng thei ang chu a um a nih.
Mi dukindaklo chun inhalna a thedar a, Mi lâwtthiem chun ṭhien bulhai a sukṭhe.
Mi hrângsie chun a tuolbâwm chu a vethlêm a, Lampui ṭhaloa chun ama a ṭhuoi hlak.
Mithai insîmtu chun thil ṭha naw a remruot a, Hmûr inchîp tlattu chun thil suol chu ân tlungtir hlak.
Lu inṭuok chu ropuina lallukhum a na, Mi fel lampuia chun hmu nîng a tih.
Mi lunginsen intaktak chu mi thilthawtheitak nêkin a ṭha lem a, A lungril thunun theitu chu khawpui latu nêkin a ṭha lem.
Ai chu mal chunga sân a ni hlak a, Thutlûkna ruok chu LALPA ta vawng a nih.
